puzzle: PEM QYHUPI GQ PEM IHAMXCGX TYZ YXM UCFM PEM MBUCAIMI GQ PEM IHZ YZJ TGGZ. EM EYI ECI QYHUPI, YZJ YUU TMZ IMM PEMT; EM BEYZDMI YDYCZ, YZJ YUU TMZ UGGF HA PG ECT.
solution: THE FAULTS OF THE SUPERIOR MAN ARE LIKE THE ECLIPSES OF THE SUN AND MOON. HE HAS HIS FAULTS, AND ALL MEN SEE THEM; HE CHANGES AGAIN, AND ALL MEN LOOK UP TO HIM.
